column1: Silhouette-based guessing challenges that stimulate memory recall and visual analysis
column2: Scoring system: The faster you guess, the more points you earn — promoting quick thinking
column3: Hints system with tradeoffs: Hints help, but they cost points — encouraging thoughtful decision-making
column4: Brain-first design: Each round is like a mini memory quiz, pushing users to tap into their knowledge of iconic characters
column5: Responsive and lightweight UI built with HTML, CSS, and React for a smooth, cross-device experience
column6: Full-stack architecture with Node.js, Express, and MongoDB to handle user sessions, scores, and game logic
